Attribute.AttributeName: Gendarme.Framework.Solution("Change the field to read-only, mark it [ThreadStatic] or make it non visible outside the assembly.")
Gendarme.Framework.Problem("This type has some static fields that are not constant. They may represent problems in multithreaded applications.")

Docs.summary: This rule warns if a non constant public static field is detected. In a multi-threaded environment access to those fields needs to be synchronized.
